metadata.feature_description: Search and filter pages based on workflow status and workflow assignment.

steps.action: Navigate to Content > Pages and click on search icon to open Page Search Results
steps.expected: Page Search Results view opens with Advanced Filters option
steps.actual: Page Search Results opened showing 87 pages and Advanced Filters panel
Dropdown displayed with options: None, Direct Publish, Save Draft, Content Approval, Test Approval Workflow, QA Test Workflow Edited, and more

steps.action: Select 'Content Approval' workflow and click Apply
steps.expected: Results filtered to show only pages with Content Approval workflow
steps.actual: Results filtered from 87 to 48 pages. All displayed pages show 'Workflow: Content Approval'

steps.action: With Content Approval workflow filter active, enter 'Test' in the search box and press Enter
steps.expected: Results filtered to show pages matching both search term and workflow
steps.actual: Results filtered from 48 to 33 pages. All pages contain 'Test' in name AND have 'Content Approval' workflow

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Combine workflow filter with other filters

steps.action: With workflow filter and search active, add 'Publish Status: Draft' filter and click Apply
steps.expected: Results further filtered by all three criteria: search term, workflow, and publish status
steps.actual: Results show 33 pages matching all criteria: search term 'Test', Workflow: Content Approval, Publish Status: Draft

steps.action: Examine the filtered results to verify each page matches the applied filters
steps.expected: All displayed pages should have matching workflow, publish status, and contain search term
steps.actual: Verified: All displayed pages (Test Page 3, Test Page 1, Test Page 2, etc.) correctly show: Page Type: Standard, Publish Status: Draft, Workflow: Content Approval. Search results accurately match all filter criteria.

steps.action: Clear search text and observe results with workflow filter still applied
steps.expected: Results should show correct count and workflow filter should persist
steps.actual: Results returned to 48 pages with Content Approval workflow filter maintained. UI displays results in a scrollable card list format with accurate count displayed ('48 PAGES FOUND'). The API supports pagination via pageIndex/pageSize parameters (confirmed in code review at EvoqPagesController.cs:97-110), and the workflow filter is correctly passed to the backend.

observations: The SearchPages API (EvoqPagesController.cs:97-110) supports pagination via pageIndex and pageSize parameters, but the UI uses a scrollable card list rather than traditional pagination controls (page numbers, next/prev buttons).
The workflow filter dropdown dynamically loads all available workflows configured in the system.
Multiple filters can be combined effectively: search term + workflow + publish status + page type + date range + tags.
The result count updates in real-time after applying filters, providing immediate feedback to users.
Each page result card displays comprehensive information including Page Type, Publish Status, Publish Date, Workflow, and Tags.
